trans-unit.source: Allows you to obtain the method or property name of the caller to the method.
trans-unit.target: 允许获取方法调用方的方法或属性名称。

trans-unit.source: You apply the `CallerMemberName` attribute to an optional parameter that has a default value.
trans-unit.target: 你将应用`CallerMemberName`属性设为可选参数具有默认值。

trans-unit.source: You must specify an explicit default value for the optional parameter.
trans-unit.target: 必须指定显式默认值为可选参数。

trans-unit.source: You can't apply this attribute to parameters that aren't specified as optional.
trans-unit.target: 你无法将此特性应用于未指定为可选的参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Caller Information](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9cb2b8c0-c4f6-44b8-9c90-38948455b373).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[调用方信息](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/9cb2b8c0-c4f6-44b8-9c90-38948455b373)。

trans-unit.source: You can use the `CallerMemberName` attribute to avoid specifying the member name as a `String` argument to the called method.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 `CallerMemberName` 特性来避免将成员名称指定为所调用的方法的 `String` 参数。

trans-unit.source: By using this technique, you avoid the problem that **Rename Refactoring** doesn't change the `String` values.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用这种技术，可以避免“重命名重构”不更改 `String` 值的问题。

trans-unit.source: This is especially useful for the following tasks:
trans-unit.target: 这是对于以下任务特别有用：

trans-unit.source: Using tracing and diagnostic routines.
trans-unit.target: 使用跟踪和诊断例程。

trans-unit.source: Implementing the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> interface when binding data.
trans-unit.target: 在绑定数据时实现 <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> 接口。

trans-unit.source: This interface allows the property of an object to notify a bound control that the property has changed, so that the control can display the updated information.
trans-unit.target: 此接口允许对象的属性通知绑定控件该属性已更改，以便此控件能够显示更新的信息。

trans-unit.source: Without the `CallerMemberName` attribute, you must specify the property name as a literal.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有 `CallerMemberName` 特性，则必须将属性名称指定为文本。

trans-unit.source: The following chart shows the member names that are returned when you use the `CallerMemberName` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 以下图表显示在使用 `CallerMemberName` 特性时返回的成员名称。

trans-unit.source: Call occurs within
trans-unit.target: 调用出现在

trans-unit.source: Member name result
trans-unit.target: 成员名称结果

trans-unit.source: Method, property, or event
trans-unit.target: 方法、属性或事件

trans-unit.source: The name of the method, property, or event from which the call originated.
trans-unit.target: 从中发起调用的方法、属性或事件的名称。

trans-unit.source: Constructor
trans-unit.target: 构造函数

trans-unit.source: The string ".ctor"
trans-unit.target: 字符串“.ctor”

trans-unit.source: Static constructor
trans-unit.target: 静态构造函数

trans-unit.source: The string ".cctor"
trans-unit.target: 字符串“.cctor”

trans-unit.source: Destructor
trans-unit.target: 析构函数

trans-unit.source: The string "Finalize"
trans-unit.target: 字符串“Finalize”

trans-unit.source: User-defined operators or conversions
trans-unit.target: 用户定义的运算符或转换

trans-unit.source: The generated name for the member, for example, "op_Addition".
trans-unit.target: 为成员生成的名称，例如，“op_Addition”。

trans-unit.source: Attribute constructor
trans-unit.target: 特性构造函数

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to which the attribute is applied.
trans-unit.target: 要应用特性的成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the attribute is any element within a member (such as a parameter, a return value, or a generic type parameter), this result is the name of the member that's associated with that element.
trans-unit.target: 如果该特性是成员中的任何元素（如参数、返回值或泛型参数），则此结果是与该元素关联的成员的名称。

trans-unit.source: No containing member (for example, assembly-level or attributes applied to types)
trans-unit.target: 无包含的成员 (例如，程序集级别或应用于类型的属性)

trans-unit.source: The default value of the optional parameter.
trans-unit.target: 可选参数的默认值。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the `CallerMemberName` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用 `CallerMemberName` 特性。

trans-unit.source: On each call to the `TraceMessage` method, the caller information is substituted as an argument to the optional parameter.
trans-unit.target: 每次调用`TraceMessage`方法，调用方信息将替换为可选参数的自变量。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallerMemberNameAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.CallerMemberNameAttribute" /> 类的新实例。
